about_the_game:
This DLC comes with:

  • an Artbook including character designs, portraits, locations, interiors, and more.
  • the Original Soundtrack for The Big Con by Dan Rodrigues featuring the song "Gimme Money" by the legendary Rockapella!
detailed_description:
This DLC comes with:

  • an Artbook including character designs, portraits, locations, interiors, and more.
  • the Original Soundtrack for The Big Con by Dan Rodrigues featuring the song "Gimme Money" by the legendary Rockapella!

short_description: This DLC comes with an Artbook including character designs, portraits, locations, interiors, and more, plus the Original Soundtrack for The Big Con by Dan Rodrigues featuring the song "Gimme Money" by the legendary Rockapella!
